original_text:
You will break them with a rod of iron;
    you will dash them to pieces like pottery.”
korean_text: 네가 철장으로 그들을 깨뜨림이여 질그릇 같이 부수리라 하시도다

sentences.original_text: You will break them with a rod of iron
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 쇠 지팡이로 그들을 부수실 것입니다

sentences.original_text: you will dash them to pieces like pottery
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 토기처럼 그들을 산산조각 낼 것입니다
